#Graphing Rubric
<br>

1.	Caption (2 sentence minimum)
2.	Axis labels
3.	Correct indpendent/dependent variables
4.	Correct number of lines or bars
5.	All of your data (or means, where appropriate)
6.	Correct graph type
7.	Legend/key
8.  Units
9.	Appropriate scale

<br>
Here is the [lecture](Meiosis.pdf) where we discussed graphing.

And here are some extra resources: an [excel how-to](nat selection example.xlsx), [examples of good and bad graphs](Good and Bad Graph Examples.pdf)
